name: Bloom and Stripe Camera Strap
description:
Handmade camera strap for SLR cameras. Made in cute Carnival Bloom and Cha-Cha Stripe coordinating fabrics with a different fabric on each side. Strap also has a sewn in lens cap pocket! Strap has fleece lining for extra comfort and is also wider to accommodate lens cap holder and longer so it can be worn across your body.

Measurements (approximate, within 1/2 an inch):
Fabric portion: 30 inches long, 3 inches wide
Faux leather portion: 2 inches long, 3 inches wide
Nylon strap portion: 12 inches long, 3/8 inch wide
Lens Cap Pocket fits lens caps up to 2 1/4 inches wide in diameter

Please measure your camera and lens cap to ensure this strap will work with your camera and lens.

name: Black and White Damask and Dot Camera Strap
description:
Handmade made camera strap for SLR/DSLR cameras. Made in cute black and white damask and polka-dot coordinating fabrics with a different fabric on each side. Strap also has a sewn in lens cap pocket! Strap has fleece lining for extra comfort, is also wider to accommodate lens cap holder, and longer so it can be worn across your body.

Measurements (approximate, within 1/2 an inch):
Fabric portion: 30 inches long, 3 inches wide
Faux leather portion: 2 inches long, 3 inches wide
Nylon strap portion: 12 inches long, 3/8 inch wide
Lens Cap Pocket fits lenses up to 2 ¼ inches wide

Please measure your camera and lens cap prior to purchase.
Want a different size or fabric??? Just convo me and I'll be happy to custom make one for you.
